page.title: 08Clothes we wear.
page.content: There is no particular style in fashion today. Anything goes. Girls have many pretty things to choose from. Most girls like skirts and blouses. The skirt is usually about knee length and can be flared or straight. Blue is a very popular colour at the moment. Some girls like to wear trousers which can be skin-tight or baggy. Baggy trousers are considered most fashionable. When visiting discos girls wear brightly coloured clothes and garish make-up. Boys,too, are very fashion concious and like to wear blue jeans and T-shirts, the jeans being as tight as possible. Some,however, are beginning to wear baggy trousers. Clothes are plentiful,but are rather expensive. (Group A.)S.J.
